languages.text: "Железношкурый никогда не врет!" {n}Молодой Волк гневно рубит воздух рукой.{/n} "А ты, Пропащий, следи за языком, если не хочешь, чтобы мой кинжал наложил на тебя епитимью вечного молчания! Нет, мы не видели их тела, но мы слышали их сумасбродные речи, что могут вести лишь в пасть к Моркаи!"

"Ironhide never lies!" {n}The young Wolf's arm cuts through the air like an axe and he angrily points at Ulfar.{/n} "And you, Everlost, watch your tongue unless you want my dagger to deliver a penance of eternal silence upon you! No, we did not see their bodies, but we heard their ranting and raving, which can only lead to the jaws of Morkai!"
languages.original_text: "Железношкурый никогда не врет!" {n}Молодой Волк гневно рубит воздух рукой.{/n} "А ты, Пропащий, следи за языком, если не хочешь, чтобы мой кинжал наложил на тебя епитимью вечного молчания! Нет, мы не видели их тела, но мы слышали их сумасбродные речи, что могут вести лишь в пасть к Моркаи!"

traits.locale_text: "Ironhide never lies!" {n}The young Wolf's arm cuts through the air like an axe and he angrily points at Ulfar.{/n} "And you, Everlost, watch your tongue unless you want my dagger to deliver a penance of eternal silence upon you! No, we did not see their bodies, but we heard their ranting and raving, which can only lead to the jaws of Morkai!"
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

No, we did not see their bodies, but we heard their ranting and raving, which can only lead to the jaws of Morkai!"

No, we did not see their bodies, but we heard their ranting and raving, which can only lead to the jaws of Morkai!"
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: “铁皮氏族从不说谎！”{n}这位年轻的狼子挥着手臂，仿佛利斧一般劈开了空气。他愤怒地指着乌尔法。{/n}“至于你，迷途之人，说话当心点，否则我的匕首会让你永远都说不出话来！没错，我们确实没亲眼见过他们的尸体，但我们听到了他们的咆哮与怒吼。这只能说明，他们已葬身于莫凯之口！”
languages.original_text: "Ironhide never lies!" {n}The young Wolf's arm cuts through the air like an axe and he angrily points at Ulfar.{/n} "And you, Everlost, watch your tongue unless you want my dagger to deliver a penance of eternal silence upon you! No, we did not see their bodies, but we heard their ranting and raving, which can only lead to the jaws of Morkai!"

traits.locale_text: “铁皮氏族从不说谎！”{n}这位年轻的狼子挥着手臂，仿佛利斧一般劈开了空气。他愤怒地指着乌尔法。{/n}“至于你，迷途之人，说话当心点，否则我的匕首会让你永远都说不出话来！没错，我们确实没亲眼见过他们的尸体，但我们听到了他们的咆哮与怒吼。这只能说明，他们已葬身于莫凯之口！”
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: 「アイアンハイドは嘘などつかぬ！」{n}若い狼の腕が斧のように空を裂き、ウルファーめがけて怒りをあらわにする。{/n}「貴様、エバーロストめ、自分の発言を省みろ。さもなくば俺の短剣で二度と口がきけぬよう断罪してやる！ああ、奴らの死体は見てないよ。だがな、イカれたわめき声を聞いたんだ。モルカイの口に通じてるに決まってる！」
languages.original_text: "Ironhide never lies!" {n}The young Wolf's arm cuts through the air like an axe and he angrily points at Ulfar.{/n} "And you, Everlost, watch your tongue unless you want my dagger to deliver a penance of eternal silence upon you! No, we did not see their bodies, but we heard their ranting and raving, which can only lead to the jaws of Morkai!"

traits.locale_text: 「アイアンハイドは嘘などつかぬ！」{n}若い狼の腕が斧のように空を裂き、ウルファーめがけて怒りをあらわにする。{/n}「貴様、エバーロストめ、自分の発言を省みろ。さもなくば俺の短剣で二度と口がきけぬよう断罪してやる！ああ、奴らの死体は見てないよ。だがな、イカれたわめき声を聞いたんだ。モルカイの口に通じてるに決まってる！」
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: «¡Piel de Hierro nunca miente!». {n}El brazo del Lobo joven corta el aire cual hacha y señala furioso a Ulfar.{/n} «Y tú, Perdido, ¡cuidado con lo que dices si no quieres que mi daga te condene a silencio perpetuo! No, no vimos los cadáveres, pero sí sus voceríos, por lo que ¡solo puede tratarse de las zarpas de Morkai!».
languages.original_text: "Ironhide never lies!" {n}The young Wolf's arm cuts through the air like an axe and he angrily points at Ulfar.{/n} "And you, Everlost, watch your tongue unless you want my dagger to deliver a penance of eternal silence upon you! No, we did not see their bodies, but we heard their ranting and raving, which can only lead to the jaws of Morkai!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Piel de Hierro nunca miente!». {n}El brazo del Lobo joven corta el aire cual hacha y señala furioso a Ulfar.{/n} «Y tú, Perdido, ¡cuidado con lo que dices si no quieres que mi daga te condene a silencio perpetuo! No, no vimos los cadáveres, pero sí sus voceríos, por lo que ¡solo puede tratarse de las zarpas de Morkai!».
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: « Peau-de-Fer ne ment jamais ! » {n}Le bras du jeune Loup fend l'air comme une hache et désigne Ulfar d'un air furieux.{/n} « Et toi, Égaré, tiens ta langue si tu ne veux pas que ma dague t'inflige la pénitence d'un silence éternel ! Non, nous n'avons pas vu leurs corps, mais nous avons entendu leurs divagations qui ne pouvaient les conduire qu'entre les mâchoires de Morkaï ! »
languages.original_text: "Ironhide never lies!" {n}The young Wolf's arm cuts through the air like an axe and he angrily points at Ulfar.{/n} "And you, Everlost, watch your tongue unless you want my dagger to deliver a penance of eternal silence upon you! No, we did not see their bodies, but we heard their ranting and raving, which can only lead to the jaws of Morkai!"

traits.locale_text: « Peau-de-Fer ne ment jamais ! » {n}Le bras du jeune Loup fend l'air comme une hache et désigne Ulfar d'un air furieux.{/n} « Et toi, Égaré, tiens ta langue si tu ne veux pas que ma dague t'inflige la pénitence d'un silence éternel ! Non, nous n'avons pas vu leurs corps, mais nous avons entendu leurs divagations qui ne pouvaient les conduire qu'entre les mâchoires de Morkaï ! »
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: "Eisenhaut lügt nie!" {n}Der Arm des jungen Wolfs durchschneidet die Luft wie eine Axt, und er zeigt wütend auf Ulfar.{/n} "Und Ihr, Siegtnie, achtet auf Eure Zunge, sonst bringt mein Dolch Euch die Strafe des ewigen Schweigens! Nein, wir haben ihre Leichen nicht gesehen, aber wir haben sie toben und rasen gehört, und das muss zwischen Morkais Kiefern enden!"
languages.original_text: "Ironhide never lies!" {n}The young Wolf's arm cuts through the air like an axe and he angrily points at Ulfar.{/n} "And you, Everlost, watch your tongue unless you want my dagger to deliver a penance of eternal silence upon you! No, we did not see their bodies, but we heard their ranting and raving, which can only lead to the jaws of Morkai!"

traits.locale_text: "Eisenhaut lügt nie!" {n}Der Arm des jungen Wolfs durchschneidet die Luft wie eine Axt, und er zeigt wütend auf Ulfar.{/n} "Und Ihr, Siegtnie, achtet auf Eure Zunge, sonst bringt mein Dolch Euch die Strafe des ewigen Schweigens! Nein, wir haben ihre Leichen nicht gesehen, aber wir haben sie toben und rasen gehört, und das muss zwischen Morkais Kiefern enden!"
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: "Demirpost asla yalan söylemez!" {n}Genç Kurt'un kolu, havayı bir balta gibi kesip Ulfar'a öfkeyle parmak sallıyor.{/n} "Hepgaip, hançerim seni ebediyen sessiz bıraksın istemiyorsan sözlerine dikkat et! Hayır, cesetlerini görmedik ama bağırışlarını duyduk. Öyle bağırışların sonu, Morkai'ın dişlerinde suskunluğa kavuşmaktır!"
languages.original_text: "Ironhide never lies!" {n}The young Wolf's arm cuts through the air like an axe and he angrily points at Ulfar.{/n} "And you, Everlost, watch your tongue unless you want my dagger to deliver a penance of eternal silence upon you! No, we did not see their bodies, but we heard their ranting and raving, which can only lead to the jaws of Morkai!"

traits.locale_text: "Demirpost asla yalan söylemez!" {n}Genç Kurt'un kolu havayı bir balta gibi kesiyor ve Ulfar'a öfkeyle parmak sallıyor.{/n} "Hepgaip, sen de hançerimden gelecek ebedî sessizlik cezasına razı değilsen sözlerine dikkat et! Hayır, bedenlerini görmedik ama bağırışlarını duyduk. Bu, sadece Morkai'ın dişleri yüzünden olabilir!"
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC
